title: Kefalonian Beef Stifado
ingredients: ['400g stewing beef', '50g plain flour', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '10 shallots, peeled', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '300ml red wine', '200ml beef stock', '1 tin of chopped tomatoes', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon allspice', '4-5 cloves', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 bay leaf', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
